introduction.heading: Genomel Data Commons
introduction.text: The GenoMEL data commons supports the management, analysis and sharing of next generation sequencing data for the GenoMEL research community and aims to accelerate opportunities for discovery of susceptibility genes for melanoma. The data commons supports cross-project analyses by harmonizing data from different projects through the development of a data dictionary and utilization of common workflows, providing an API for data queries, and providing a cloud-based analysis workspace with rich tools and resources.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The data are defined in a generic way by the dictionary. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Jupyter Notebooks in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis

login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact support@bionimbus.org.
